attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. this app has ruined my life. i downloaded it because i read a review saying when you open the app you would see a pretty field of trees that oranges grow on. instead i opened the app and saw ONE UGLY ORANGE. it scared me so bad that my eyes went blind. luckily my sister was nice enough to give me her eyeballs. but anyways i then try to go to sleep and forget about the ugly orange. i was peacefully sleeping then i woke up to footsteps downstairs. i go down and look AND ITS THE ORANGE. he picked me up and chucked me to mars. i told a martian about what happened and he said he doesn’t want anything to do with me or the orange so he turned me around and booted me on the butt all the way back to my house. i landed on my roof and started to tan because i have nothing better to do. THE ORANGE THEN CAME AND SPRAYED ME WITH HIS SPRAY AND NOW I LOOK LIKE HIM. my family couldn’t take me being so ugly that they killed me. i’m writing this from hotdog heaven and i’m eating a hotdog as i write this. but for everyone’s own safety do NOT get this app.
attributes.title: ruined my life.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our president but received a message shortly after that Donald Trump (POTUS) wanted to KILL my family. This was deeply unsettling and when i asked why he said ‘ur family is a bunch of f*gs and deserve to die, ur evil ahould not be spread amongst the world any further’ I couldn’t read another word after that because I was then AMBUSHED by a giant orange baby who said I was a fat liberal and that no man would EVER want to ‘grab me by the p*ssy’ I believe the people of this country are in great danger if this man stays in this position of power any longer.
attributes.title: POTUS wanted my family KILLED??

attributes.review: When I opened the app I got traumatized I saw this weird looking thing and it was more orange then a cheeto and its hair looked like corn and then after I saw that I blacked out and woke up and found myself having a bbq with aliens on a different planet then I showed them the orange Cheeto and asked if it was related to them they said sister we ain’t that ugly they they flew me back to earth and I was in Mexico eating tacos with them I also showed them the orange corn hair looken Cheeto and they kicked me out saying u got a demon in your phone and whenever I want to open the app it starts playing the little Einstein’s theme song but not gonna lie I liked the song but the app was terrible horrible I dare u if u disagree with me fight me don’t be shy I do bite ok but really after I opened the app weird things happened like my parrot said what have u done u summoned a demon then flew out the window and my sisters started saying mooooo but that is normal and my burrito didn’t taste right well download at ur own risk
attributes.title: Don’t get it trust me
